events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived. The shipping seems delayed beyond the expected date.
System identified the issue as a delivery delay based on customer's mention of late arrival and shipping delay.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the case regarding delayed delivery.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you may have received so I can check the status for you?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 453216789, and I received a tracking code but it hasn't updated for several days.
I have contacted the shipping carrier with your tracking information. They confirmed a delay due to logistics issues. We expect your package to arrive within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate you checking on this. It's disappointing the delay happened, but I understand and will wait for the next update.
Thank you for your patience. We consider this case resolved given the shipping carrier's update and the expected delivery timeframe.
Just checking in to see if your package has arrived and if everything is satisfactory with your order now.
Yes, I received the package yesterday and everything was in perfect condition. Thank you for your support!
We are closing this case happily as your package was delivered and you are satisfied with the support.
